name: Breakout Birdie 2
description:
Bounce your birdie ball through 60 levels of colorful blocks and stubborn bosses in this block-bashing Breakout Birdie sequel! Take aim at countless block types and a bevy of bug and bird bosses! Hit bombs to set off chain explosions! Blast out of cannon blocks or teleport across the stage through swirling portals! Catch golden power-ups to temporarily improve your birdie and paddle! Avoid the red power-ups or risk losing control of a speeding birdie or finding yourself flying blind!

GAMEPLAY
Slide your finger left and right to move the paddle, and lift your finger to launch the birdie ball. Bounce the ball off the paddle and into blocks and bosses, but don’t let it hit the ground! Catch falling power-ups using the paddle to gain extra lives, a second birdie ball, a bigger paddle, and many more!

For more information, please refer to the How to Play screens within the app.

FEATURES
* The sequel to the original block-bashing birdie bonanza!
* Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
* 14 block types including bombs, cannons, and portals!
* Nine power-ups to enhance your abilities!
* 60 unique levels to unlock and master!
* Colorful cartoon characters and environments!
* Bright and bubbly background tunes!
* Intuitive touch-screen controls!
* Suitable for players of all ages!
